price: Rabbiin malee dhugaan gabbaramaan biraa hinjiruu beeki; dilii teetiif araarama (Rabbii) kadhu; mu’uminoota dhiiraafi dubartootaatiifis (kadhu). Rabbiin sochii keessaniifi qubannoota keessanis ni beeka.
arabic: فَٱعۡلَمۡ أَنَّهُۥ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡ لِذَنۢبِكَ وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مُتَقَلَّبَكُمۡ وَمَثۡوَىٰكُمۡ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fa-iʿ'lam annahu lā ilāha illā al-lahu wa-is'taghfir lidhanbika walil'mu'minīna wal-mu'mināti wal-lahu yaʿlamu mutaqallabakum wamathwākum
